title: Hello World! ðŸ‘‹
description: This is the very first post of this blog. You can see how I made this page.
author: junbrro

body.raw: Hello! I am junbrro, the manager of this blog. I am currently a junior of Yonsei University, majoring in NSE (Nano Science & Engineering) & EEE (Electric & Electronic Engineering). I am running this blog to share my insights over **Deep Learning Science** & **Buisness (Start-Up)** & **Web development** & etc.
